attributes.action: Call for a Public enquiry into Bias and Government influence shown by BBC in the reporting of the Scottish referendum
attributes.additional_details:
During the campaigning in the run up to the Scottish Referendum it has been clear to all, that a tax payer funded organisation namely the BBC has been influenced by Government and has broadcast biased and politically motivated reports in an effort to sway the opinion of the populous.
A Full Public enquiry is required to establish whether a bias has been shown and to establish any Government involvement in editorial decision’s made, contrary to the BBC’s own charter.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC Trust.
